p: Scholars have also explored how COVID‐19 plays a significant role in people and information dissemination tools by employing Social Network Services (SNS) and Social Network Analysis (SNA; see e.g., 25 , 26 , 27 , 28 ). This is because SNS and SNA are some of the most important data sources and visualisation methodologies for information dissemination in our knowledge‐based society and are utilised in many academic fields, such as medicine, urban planning, business, engineering, and so on.
